00028 #include "AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel.hpp"
00029 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00030 
00031 AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel()
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::~AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel()
00036 {
00037 }
00038 
00039 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::Initialise()
00040 {
00041     SetG1Duration();
00042 }
00043 
00044 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell()
00045 {
00046     AbstractCellCycleModel::InitialiseDaughterCell();
00047     SetG1Duration();
00048 }
00049 
00050 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::SetG1Duration()
00051 {
00052     assert(mpCell != NULL);
00053 
00054     switch (mCellProliferativeType)
00055     {
00056         case STEM:
00057             mG1Duration = GetStemCellG1Duration();
00058             break;
00059         case TRANSIT:
00060             mG1Duration = GetTransitCellG1Duration();
00061             break;
00062         case DIFFERENTIATED:
00063             mG1Duration = DBL_MAX;
00064             break;
00065         default:
00066             NEVER_REACHED;
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision()
00071 {
00072     AbstractCellCycleModel::ResetForDivision();
00073     mBirthTime = SimulationTime::Instance()->GetTime();
00074     SetG1Duration();
00075 }
00076 
00077 void AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel::UpdateCellCyclePhase()
00078 {
00079     double time_since_birth = GetAge();
00080     assert(time_since_birth >= 0);
00081 
00082     if (mCellProliferativeType == DIFFERENTIATED)
00083     {
00084         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = G_ZERO_PHASE;
00085     }
00086     else if ( time_since_birth < GetMDuration() )
00087     {
00088         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = M_PHASE;
00089     }
00090     else if ( time_since_birth < GetMDuration() + mG1Duration)
00091     {
00092         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = G_ONE_PHASE;
00093     }
00094     else if ( time_since_birth < GetMDuration() + mG1Duration + GetSDuration())
00095     {
00096         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = S_PHASE;
00097     }
00098     else if ( time_since_birth < GetMDuration() + mG1Duration + GetSDuration() + GetG2Duration())
00099     {
00100         mCurrentCellCyclePhase = G_TWO_PHASE;
00101     }
00102 }
